entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers or periods of drizzle beginning this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle or showers. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023
